lore: An ambitious project was carried out in the Columbia Tower to give life to inanimate objects. Grimoires are the result of a long and tedious experiment whose purpose was to create singular and extraordinary spells that would be preserved for eternity.\n\nIt smells like old leather; its pages have been turned hundreds of times. Anyone who opens the Faded Grimoire without taking the necessary precautions will see their lifespan reduced every second.
menagerieDialog: I shall wreak havoc upon my enemies via a thousand papercuts!
There is a great number of books about battle strategy. A comprehensive review of such tomes would be of great help in your endeavors.
Nothing beats a warm fire, a fresh-cooked meal, and a good book.
(It's taking a nap, which conveniently makes it look like an ordinary book.)
name: Faded Grimoire
